missing.tests

Class SourceTests

  • java.lang.Object
    • missing.tests.SourceTests

  • public class SourceTests
extends java.lang.Object
    these are tests for all the items which extend source

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SourceTests() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void fishArea_Invalid_Test_1()
      Creates a fishArea and performs its action, this should fail as no fishing rod has been created
      void fishAreaTest_1()
      Creates a fishArea and performs its action, then asserts that the if the player ends up with 2 items in their pocket, the second is a fish
      void rockTest_1()
      Creates a rock and performs its action, then asserts that the player has 1 item in its pocket
      void rockTest_2()
      Creates a rock and performs its action, then asserts that the player has 1 Stone in its pocket
      void rockTest_3()
      Tests that when a player breaks the Rock, he gets 1 stone
      void rockTest_4()
      Creates an pickaxe, player and rock.
      void soilTest_1()
      Creates a soil and performs its action, then asserts that the player has 1 item in its pocket
      void soilTest_2()
      Creates a soil and performs its action, then asserts that the player has 1 dirt in its pocket
      void soilTest_3()
      Tests that when a player breaks the soil, he gets 1 Dirt
      void soilTest_4()
      Creates a shovel, player and soil.
      void treeTest_1()
      Creates a player and a tree, then performs the tree's action.
      void treeTest_2()
      Creates a player and a tree, then performs the tree's action.
      void treeTest_3()
      Asserts that if the player has 2 items in his pocket, the first is Wood, and the second is an Apple
      void treeTest_4()
      Tests that when a player breaks the tree, he gets 1 wood
      void treeTest_5()
      Creates an axe, player and tree.

      • treeTest_1

        public void treeTest_1()
        Creates a player and a tree, then performs the tree's action. Test ensures player has 1, or 2 items(if the tree drops an apple) in pocket after action

      • treeTest_2

        public void treeTest_2()
        Creates a player and a tree, then performs the tree's action. Test ensures player has 1 wood in pocket after action

      • treeTest_3

        public void treeTest_3()
        Asserts that if the player has 2 items in his pocket, the first is Wood, and the second is an Apple

      • treeTest_4

        public void treeTest_4()
        Tests that when a player breaks the tree, he gets 1 wood

      • treeTest_5

        public void treeTest_5()
        Creates an axe, player and tree. Adds the axe to the players pocekt, then cuts down the tree Tests that when a player breaks the tree with an axe, he gets 3 wood

      • rockTest_4

        public void rockTest_4()
        Creates an pickaxe, player and rock. Adds the pickaxe to the players pocket, then hits the rock Tests that when a player hits the rock with a pickaxe, he gets 5 stone

      • soilTest_1

        Creates a shovel, player and soil. Adds the shovel to the players pocket, then digs the soil Tests that when a player digs the soil with a shovel, he gets 5 Dirt
